parameters.name: Num1
parameters.description: Number of instances of the linear pattern in Direction 1, including the original

parameters.name: Spacing1
parameters.description: Spacing in meters between each instance of the linear pattern in Direction 1

parameters.name: Num2
parameters.description: Number of instances of the linear pattern in Direction 2, including the original

parameters.name: Spacing2
parameters.description: Spacing in meters between each instance of the linear pattern in Direction 2

parameters.name: FlipDir1
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the linear pattern in Direction 1, false to not

parameters.name: FlipDir2
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the linear pattern in Direction 2, false to not

parameters.name: DName1
parameters.description: Name of the dimension defining Direction 1

parameters.name: DName2
parameters.description: Name of the dimension defining Direction 2

parameters.name: GeometryPattern
parameters.description: True to use geometry pattern, false to not

parameters.name: VaryInstance
parameters.description: True to vary the dimensions and spacing of individual pattern instances, false to not; valid only if GeometryPattern = false (see Remarks )

parameters.name: HasOffset1
parameters.description: True if using Offset1 to specify an offset of the pattern seed from a selected reference in Direction 1, false if not

parameters.name: HasOffset2
parameters.description: True if using Offset2 to specify an offset of the pattern seed from a selected reference in Direction 2, false if not

parameters.name: CtrlByNum1
parameters.description: True to control pattern spacing using Num1, false to control it using Spacing1; valid only if HasOffset1 is true

parameters.name: CtrlByNum2
parameters.description: True to control pattern spacing using Num2, false to control it using Spacing2; valid only if HasOffset2 is true

parameters.name: FromCentroid1
parameters.description: True if Offset1 is measured from the centroid of the seed instance, false if it is measured from a selected reference on the seed instance; valid only if HasOffset1 is true (see Remarks )

parameters.name: FromCentroid2
parameters.description: True if Offset2 is measured from the centroid of the seed instance, false if it is measured from a selected reference on the seed instance; valid only if HasOffset2 is true (see Remarks )

parameters.name: RevOffset1
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of Offset1, false to not; valid only if HasOffset1 is true

parameters.name: RevOffset2
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of Offset2, false to not; valid only if HasOffset2 is true

parameters.name: Offset1
parameters.description: Offset in meters from a selected reference in Direction 1; valid only if HasOffset1 is true (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Offset2
parameters.description: Offset in meters from a selected reference in Direction 2; valid only if HasOffset2 is true (see Remarks )

parameters.name: D2PatternSeedOnly
parameters.description: True to create a linear pattern in Direction 2 using the seed features only, without replicating the pattern instances of Direction 1; false to not

parameters.name: SyncSubAssemblies
parameters.description: True to move components in the patterned instances when components are moved in the seed flexible subassembly, false to not

remarks:
If...
To select a feature, use...
To select a body, use...
To select a component, use...
Using
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to select features, solid bodies, and components requires ordered selection
1 to mark Direction 1
2 to mark Direction 2
4 to mark the features to pattern
2097152 to mark references for Offset1 and Offset2
8388608 to mark a seed instance reference when FromCentroid1 or FromCentroid2 is false
1 to mark Direction 1
256 to mark the solid bodies to pattern
1 to mark the components to pattern
2 and 4 to mark the directions
Directly selecting a feature, solid body, or component
IEntity::Select4
with
ISelectData::Mark
=
1 to mark Direction 1
2 to mark Direction 2
IFeature::Select2
with Mark=
4 to mark the features to pattern
2097152 to mark references for Offset1 and Offset2
8388608 to mark a seed instance reference when FromCentroid1 or FromCentroid2 is false
IEntity::Select4 with ISelectData::Mark=1 to mark Direction 1
IBody2::Select2
with ISelectData::Mark=256 to mark the bodies to pattern
IComponent2::Select4
and ISelectData::Mark=1 to mark the components to pattern
IEntity::Select4 and ISelectData::Mark=2 and 4 to mark the directions
